verbose_text: To further study the mechanism involved in alpinetin induced cell growth inhibition and apoptosis, the changes in the expression of the Bcl-2 family members and XIAP and in the release of cytochrome c were assessed by western blot analysis following treatment with alpinetin for 48 h (XREF_FIG).
evidence: induced cell growth inhibition and apoptosis, the changes in the expression of the Bcl-2 family members and XIAP
